title: [FSX] Sinbwings AN-2
description:
Dear friends! We are happy to introduce our new product Antonov An-2.

This is a very special project for our team. The reason for this is a close connection between the An-2 and SibWings team as we were born in one and the same city of Novosibirsk with a 60 years difference in time. WeÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ve been approaching to this bird for a long time gaining EXPERIENCE and innovation in order to develop a product we could be really proud of. So, here you go Ã¢â‚¬â€œ the Antonov An-2!


In this FSX package we offer you the most common An-2 twelve-seater passenger model and six repaints. This model faithfully reproduces all the particular An-2 features in a meticulous way. You will enjoy the exquisite rendition of the exterior and interior models, highly-detailed 3D-panel and HD textures, fully-animated dynamic VC, accurate FLIGHT dynamics, authentic sounds, and so much more that will make your An-2 flying experience a pure pleasure!

Features: 

3D Models

Accurate exterior and interior models developed specially for FSX
HD textures with specular, bump and reflection maps
Despite the above mentioned this model is quite FPS friendly
Panel & Gauges

All gauges are developed with 3D parts
Separately animated needles shadows, so they look very realistic
Most knobs have moving along shadows
Panel surface contains bump-map
Gauge glass has reflection and fingertips visible at a specific sun angle
Realistic night light
If you use DX10 you'll have dynamic shadows inside the cockpit
Systems

ELECTRIC system is fully simulated
Pneumatic system is partly simulated
Realistic ENGINE starting system (Ctrl+E doesn't work)
Simulated ENGINE overheat and engine fire, anti-fire system is also included
FLIGHT dynamics

Accurate FLIGHT dynamics developed in close cooperation with the real An-2 pilots
Sounds

Engine sounds recorded from the real aircraft
Most switches, knobs levers are sounded

System Requirements: 

WINDOWS VISTA/7/8
Microsoft FLIGHT SIMULATOR X SP2/Acceleration
2GHz CPU / 2GB RAM / 512 MB Graphics
Available hard drive space: 350 MB
Desired: Joystick, TrackIR
Windows compatibility mode should be off for FSX

Passrar: ellute2

Enjoy!!!!
